abstract: The default grounding shadow behavior for the device’s platform.
overview:
## Discussion

In visionOS, the default case is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/fade] when the the system can detect the entity represents a UI; otherwise,[doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/constant].

In iOS, the default case is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/constant].

# GroundingShadowComponent.FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects.default

**Case**

The default grounding shadow behavior for the device’s platform.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

In visionOS, the default case is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/fade] when the the system can detect the entity represents a UI; otherwise,[doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/constant].

In iOS, the default case is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/constant].
title: GroundingShadowComponent.FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects.default
